articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill yesterday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 They placed the floral basket before the statue and paid tribute to the President in humble reverence.

Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory letter from the economic and commercial councilors corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 11th anniversary of his election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
 The letter was conveyed to an official concerned by Evelio Duenas Ponce, commercial councilor of the Cuban embassy who is doyen of the corps, on April 12.

Land Lease Contract Signed between North and South
articles.content:
Land Lease Contract Signed between North and South
    Kaesong, April 13 (KCNA) -- A contract for the lease of one million-phyong factory plottage at the first phase of the construction of the Kaesong Industrial Zone was signed in Kaesong today.
 It was inked by Pak Chang Ryon, general director of the General Bureau for the Central Guidance to the Special Zone Development, from the north side and Kim Jin Ho, president of the Land Company, and Kim Yun Gyu, president of Hyundai Asan, from the south side.    
 The conclusion and effectuation of the land lease contract between the north and the south would help push forward on a full scale the project in the one million-phyong factory plottage at the first phase of the Kaesong Industrial Zone.

articles.title: Floral Baskets from Japanese Figures
articles.content:
Floral Baskets from Japanese Figures
    Pyongyang, April 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented today with floral baskets by Japanese figures Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime, Japan, Institute for Modern Korean Studies, Kosuke Tokita, chairman of the Chiba Prefecture, Japan, Ichihara Society for Korean Studies, Fusatoshi Fujisawa, representative of the Love and Peace of Japan and the Society for Assisting Korean Schools in Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan on the occasion of the Day of the Sun and the 11th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
 The ribbons of the floral baskets bore the words "We sincerely wish Your Excellency Great General Secretary Kim Jong Il good health."
